news.headline: Tesla sales fall in France and Denmark for seventh straight month
news.summary: Tesla's aging lineup is facing a wave of low-cost EV rivals, especially from China. news.headline: Stocks to Watch Thursday: Microsoft, Qualcomm, Arm, Meta
news.summary: ↗️ Microsoft (MSFT): Shares in the technology titan rose more than 9% in premarket trading after it reported a strong quarter, driven by cloud services and AI demand. If the stock holds gains, Microsoft will open with a market value above $4 trillion.

news.headline: Amazon Q2: Almost Flawless Performance, Misunderstood By The Market
news.summary: Amazon.com, Inc.'s Q2 impresses but shares dip on cautious Q3 outlook. Click for my updated look at AMZN stock and why I remain as bullish as ever.
